entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
